body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information. As part of the conversation, the customer should ask two questions.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should cover two or three topics, have back and forth between the parties, and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Artsy School Support. My name is Michael Jones. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Tiffany. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling sad because the student data management system seems to be down. Can you help me with that?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Tiffany. Could you please provide me with your student ID and email address for verification?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My student ID is three four eight nine and my email address is tiffany.kelly@example.com.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: How long will it take to resolve this issue?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: We are working on it currently. I appreciate your patience, Tiffany.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing the information. We will look into this matter and get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you for your time today, Tiffany.
